meta.description: Determine the minimum number of salespersons needed to meet the staffing requirements of a 24-hour convenience store.

sets.name: TIME_PERIODS
sets.description: Time periods during which staffing requirements are specified.

sets.name: START_TIMES
sets.description: Start times for shifts, each lasting 8 hours.

params.name: requirements
params.description: Number of salespersons required during each time period.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of salespersons starting their shift at each start time.

objective.name: min_total_salespersons
objective.description: Minimize the total number of salespersons.

constraints.name: requirement_2:00-6:00
constraints.description: Ensure enough salespersons are working during 2:00-6:00.

constraints.name: requirement_6:00-10:00
constraints.description: Ensure enough salespersons are working during 6:00-10:00.

constraints.name: requirement_10:00-14:00
constraints.description: Ensure enough salespersons are working during 10:00-14:00.

constraints.name: requirement_14:00-18:00
constraints.description: Ensure enough salespersons are working during 14:00-18:00.

constraints.name: requirement_18:00-22:00
constraints.description: Ensure enough salespersons are working during 18:00-22:00.

constraints.name: requirement_22:00-2:00
constraints.description: Ensure enough salespersons are working during 22:00-2:00.
